00033 void *
00034 run_download(void *data)
00035 {
00036         downinfo *dinfo = (downinfo *) data;
00037         //  lnk* link = dinfo->link;// (lnk *) data;
00038         lnk_http_header *linkh; // = malloc(sizeof(lnk_http_header));
00039 
00040         if (http_link_header(dinfo->link, &linkh) == -1)
00041                 return (void *) (-1);
00042         if (thr_mgr_downloadallchunks(dinfo->resultdir, dinfo->link, linkh)
00043                         == -1)
00044                 return (void *) (-1);
00045

00047 //      printf("I AM THREAD rquri: %s with filesize:%lld and type:%s\n",
00048 //                      dinfo->link->rquri, linkh->clen, linkh->ctype);
00049 
00050         return (void *) (0);
00051 }

00057 void
00058 thr_mgr_downloadallfiles(prgstx *stx)
00059 {
00060         int lnkidx = 0;
00061         int *retval;
00062 
00063 
00064         pthread_t *downloaders = malloc(sizeof (pthread_t) * stx->numlinks);
00065         lnk *links = malloc(sizeof (lnk) * stx->numlinks);
00066         int *activepthr = malloc(sizeof (int) * stx->numlinks);
00067         downinfo *dinfo = malloc(sizeof (downinfo) * stx->numlinks);

00069         // set chunk num
00070 //      links[lnkidx].chunknum = stx->chunks;
00071 //
00072 //      dinfo[lnkidx].link = &links[lnkidx];
00073 //      dinfo[lnkidx].resultdir = stx->resultdir;

00079         for (lnkidx = 0; lnkidx != stx->numlinks; ++lnkidx) {
00080                 links[lnkidx].chunknum = stx->chunks;
00081                 if ((activepthr[lnkidx] = link_parse(stx->links[lnkidx],
00082                                 &links[lnkidx])) != -1) {
00083                         links[lnkidx].chunknum = stx->chunks;
00084                         printf("downloading link %s%s\n",
00085                                         links[lnkidx].hostname,
00086                                         links[lnkidx].filename);
00087                         dinfo[lnkidx].link = &links[lnkidx];
00088                         dinfo[lnkidx].resultdir = stx->resultdir;
00089                         if (pthread_create(&downloaders[lnkidx], NULL,
00090                                         run_download, &dinfo[lnkidx]) != 0) {
00091                                 fprintf(stdlog, log_ERROR
00092                                                 "thread for link %s couldn't "
00093                                                 "be created\n",
00094                                                 links[lnkidx].rquri);
00095                                 activepthr[lnkidx] = -1;
00096                         }
00097                 }
00098         }
00099 
00100         printf("\nWait please for downloading all links...\n\n");
00101 
00102         for (lnkidx = 0; lnkidx != stx->numlinks; ++lnkidx) {
00103                 if (activepthr[lnkidx] != -1) {
00104                         pthread_join(downloaders[lnkidx], (void **) &retval);
00105 //                      printf("RETVAL: %d\n", (int) retval);
00106                         if (retval == 0) {
00107                                 printf("%s successfully downloaded! "
00108                                                 "(http://%s%s)\n",
00109                                                 links[lnkidx].filename,
00110                                                 links[lnkidx].hostname,
00111                                                 links[lnkidx].rquri);
00112                         }
00113                 }
00114         }
00115 
00116         free(links);
00117         free(downloaders);
00118         free(activepthr);
00119 }

00149 // allocate file
00150 // resolve filename
00151 // map into memory (mmap)
00152 // create chunk threads, wait for every success, if unsuccessfull
00153 // -> delete file, report error
00159 int
00160 thr_mgr_downloadallchunks(const char *resultdir, lnk *link,
00161                 lnk_http_header *linkh)
00162 {
00163         file_fd fd;
00164         char buf = '\0';
00165 //      int idx = 0;
00166         int chidx = 0;
00167         int *retval;
00168         int mgrretval;
00169         chunk_bounds *bounds;
00170         maptbl *maptable;
00171         pthread_t *chunkthrs;
00172 
00173         mk_filename(resultdir, link);
00174 
00175         if ((fd = open(link->filename, O_CREAT| O_EXCL | O_RDWR, S_IRUSR
00176                         | S_IWUSR | S_IRGRP | S_IROTH)) == -1) {
00177                 fprintf(stdlog, log_ERROR
00178                                 "Couldn't create file %s ", link->filename);
00179                 perror("open");
00180                 return (-1);
00181         }
00182 
00183 //      if (ftruncate(fd, linkh->clen) != 0)
00184 //      {
00185 //              fprintf(stdlog, log_ERROR
00186 //                              "file couldn't be truncated"
00187 //                              " to specified size\n");
00188 //      }
00189 
00190         // set filesize
00191         lseek(fd, linkh->clen - 1, SEEK_SET);
00192         write(fd, &buf, 1);
00193 
00194         create_chunk_bounds(&bounds, link, linkh, fd, &maptable);
00195         //  create_chunk_bounds(&bounds, link, linkh, fd);
00196         chunkthrs = malloc(sizeof (pthread_t) * link->chunknum);
00197 
00198 
00199         for (chidx = 0; chidx != link->chunknum; ++chidx) {
00200                 pthread_create(&chunkthrs[chidx], NULL,
00201                                 run_download_chunk, &bounds[chidx]);
00202         }
00203 
00204         mgrretval = 0;
00205         for (chidx = 0; chidx != link->chunknum; ++chidx) {
00206                 pthread_join(chunkthrs[chidx], (void **) &retval);
00207                 if (retval != 0) {
00208                         mgrretval = (int)retval;
00209                 }
00210         }
00211 
00212         free(chunkthrs);
00213 
00214         if (maptable->memlen != -1) {
00215                 if (munmap(maptable->memory, maptable->memlen) == -1) {
00216                         perror("munmap");
00217                 }
00218         }
00219 
00220         free(maptable);
00221 
00222 //      fprintf(stdlog, "created:%s\n", link->filename);
00223         if (close(fd) == -1) {
00224                 fprintf(stdlog, log_ERROR "File descriptor for filename %s "
00225                                 "couldn't be closed.\n", link->filename);
00226                 return (-1);
00227         }
00228 
00229         return (mgrretval);
00230 }

00242 int
00243 create_chunk_bounds(chunk_bounds **bounds, lnk *link, lnk_http_header *lnkh,
00244                 file_fd fd, maptbl **maptable)
00245 {
00246         int map_times = (int) (lnkh->clen / MAX_MAP_SIZE);
00247         // modulo size of file moduling MAX_MAP_SIZE
00248         int map_mod = (int) (lnkh->clen % MAX_MAP_SIZE);
00249 
00250         int mpidx, chidx, challidx; // , idx;
00251         // piece = size of one piece
00252         // size = number of items in one mapping memory or res.chunk memory
00253         long long int actualpos, filepos;
00254         long long int chunkpiece = lnkh->clen
00255                         / ((long long int) link->chunknum);
00256 
00257         int chunkmp_size = MAX_MAP_SIZE / chunkpiece;
00258         long long int chunkmp_piece = MAX_MAP_SIZE
00259                         / (long long int) chunkmp_size;
00260 
00261         int chunk_res_size;
00262         long long int chunk_res_piece;
00263         char *memory;
00264 
00265         *maptable = malloc(sizeof (maptbl));
00266         (*maptable)->memlen = 0;
00267         if (map_mod)
00268                 ++((*maptable)->memlen);
00269 //      (*maptable)->items = malloc(sizeof (mapitem) * (*maptable)->size);
00270 
00271         if (link->chunknum < map_times + (*maptable)->memlen) {
00272                 fprintf(
00273                 stdlog, log_ERROR "Number of chunks too small for downloading"
00274                         " a big file from link %s, setting chunk num to"
00275                         " %lli\n", link->rquri,
00276                         map_times + (*maptable)->memlen);
00277                 link->chunknum = (int)(map_times + (*maptable)->memlen);
00278         }
00279 
00280         *bounds = malloc(sizeof (chunk_bounds) * link->chunknum);
00281 
00282         challidx = 0;
00283         filepos = 0;
00284         mpidx = 0;
00285 
00286         // chunks which are to mmap MAX_MAP_SIZE replace with NULL memory
00287         for (; mpidx < map_times; ++mpidx) {
00288         // allocaate memory and assign it chunks
00289         // which are smaller than max map size

00291 //              if ((memory = mmap(0, (size_t)MAX_MAP_SIZE, PROT_READ |
00292 //                              PROT_WRITE, MAP_SHARED, fd,
00293 //                              (off_t) filepos)) == MAP_FAILED) {
00294 //                      perror("mmap");
00295 //                      memory = '\0';
00296 // //                   return (-1);
00297 //              }
00298 //              memory = '\0';
00299 
00300 //              (*maptable)->items[mpidx].memlen = MAX_MAP_SIZE;
00301 //              (*maptable)->items[mpidx].memory = memory;
00302 
00303                 actualpos = 0;
00304                 for (chidx = 0; chidx < chunkmp_size - 1; ++chidx) {
00305                 // for (chidx = 0; chidx < link->chunknum -1; ++chidx)
00306                         (*bounds)[challidx].memory = NULL;
00307                         (*bounds)[challidx].startpos = actualpos;
00308                         actualpos += chunkmp_piece;
00309                         (*bounds)[challidx].endpos = actualpos -1;
00310                         (*bounds)[challidx].memlen = (size_t) (actualpos -
00311                                         (*bounds)[challidx].startpos);
00312                         (*bounds)[challidx].lnk = link;
00313                         (*bounds)[challidx].lnk_header = lnkh;
00314                         (*bounds)[challidx].fd = fd;
00315                         (*bounds)[challidx].mpidx = mpidx;
00316 
00317                         ++challidx;
00318                 }
00319 
00320                 (*bounds)[challidx].memory = NULL;
00321                 (*bounds)[challidx].startpos = actualpos;
00322                 (*bounds)[challidx].endpos = MAX_MAP_SIZE - 1;
00323                 (*bounds)[challidx].memlen = (size_t) MAX_MAP_SIZE - actualpos;
00324                 (*bounds)[challidx].lnk = link;
00325                 (*bounds)[challidx].lnk_header = lnkh;
00326                 (*bounds)[challidx].fd = fd;
00327                 (*bounds)[challidx].mpidx = mpidx;
00328                 ++challidx;
00329 
00330                 filepos += MAX_MAP_SIZE;
00331         }
00332 
00333         chunk_res_size = link->chunknum - challidx;
00334         if (map_mod) { // if modulo of page mapping is greater than 0
00335                 if (map_mod / chunk_res_size == 0) {
00336                         fprintf(stdlog, log_ERROR
00337                                         "number of chunks of link %s will be "
00338                                         "diminished (-%d chunks) (large file "
00339                                         "doesn't fit memory map size)",
00340                                         link->rquri, map_times);
00341                         link->chunknum = link->chunknum - map_times;
00342                         chunk_res_size = link->chunknum - challidx;
00343                 }
00344 
00345                 if ((memory = mmap(0, (size_t)(lnkh->clen - filepos),
00346                                 PROT_READ | PROT_WRITE, MAP_SHARED, fd,
00347                                 (off_t) filepos)) == MAP_FAILED) {
00348                         perror("mmap");
00349                         memory = '\0';
00350 //                      return (-1);
00351                 }
00352 
00353                 (*maptable)->memlen =
00354                         (size_t)(lnkh->clen - filepos);
00355                 (*maptable)->memory = memory;
00356 
00357                 assert(map_mod / chunk_res_size > 0);
00358 
00359                 chunk_res_piece = map_mod / chunk_res_size;
00360 
00361                 actualpos = 0;
00362                 for (chidx = 0; chidx < chunk_res_size - 1; ++chidx) {
00363                 // for (chidx = 0; chidx < link->chunknum -1; ++chidx)
00364                         (*bounds)[challidx].memory = (memory == NULL) ? memory :
00365                                         memory + actualpos;
00366                         (*bounds)[challidx].startpos = actualpos;
00367                         actualpos += chunk_res_piece;
00368                         (*bounds)[challidx].endpos = actualpos -1;
00369                         (*bounds)[challidx].memlen = (size_t) (actualpos -
00370                                         (*bounds)[challidx].startpos);
00371                         (*bounds)[challidx].lnk = link;
00372                         (*bounds)[challidx].lnk_header = lnkh;
00373                         (*bounds)[challidx].fd = fd;
00374                         (*bounds)[challidx].mpidx = mpidx;
00375                         ++challidx;
00376                 }
00377 
00378                 (*bounds)[challidx].memory = (memory == NULL) ? memory :
00379                                 memory + actualpos;
00380                 (*bounds)[challidx].startpos = actualpos;
00381                 (*bounds)[challidx].endpos = map_mod - 1;
00382                 (*bounds)[challidx].memlen = (size_t) map_mod - actualpos;
00383                 (*bounds)[challidx].lnk = link;
00384                 (*bounds)[challidx].lnk_header = lnkh;
00385                 (*bounds)[challidx].fd = fd;

00387                 ++challidx;
00388         }
00389 
00390         assert(challidx == link->chunknum);
00391 
00392         return (0);
00393 }
